description: Indigenous Services Canada is seeking to obtain the services of two (2) Change Management Consultants at Senior level to support the team to analyze existing processes and new processes coming out from business process mapping work, develop plans and strategies to best implement the newly designed process and procedures.
tags: Services-conseil en affaires/Services de gestion du changement
full_summary:
# TSPS - 2.6 Change Management Consultant

## Opportunity Overview

The Government of Canada is seeking the services of two senior Change Management Consultants to support Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) in analyzing existing and new processes, developing plans and strategies to implement newly designed processes and procedures.

The contract will be awarded under the Trade Services Procurement System (TSPS) Supply Arrangement, and is open to all qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who have achieved Tier 1 under Stream 2: Business Consulting/Change Management, Category 2.6: Change Management Consultant - (2) Senior.

## Selection Criteria

The following Supply Arrangement Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
* BDO Canada LLP
* Donna Cona Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* Évaluation Personnel Sélection International Inc.
* Goss Gilroy Inc.
* IT/Net - Ottawa Inc.
* Le Groupe Conseil Bronson Consulting Group
* MNP LLP
* Mobile Resource Group Inc.
* Niewe Technology and Consulting Ltd.
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
* SEASI Consulting Inc.

## Contract Details

* **Contract CI/KA Name:** Change Management Consultant (2) Senior
* **GSIN:** R019BF
* **CI/KAs Category:** 2.6 Change Management Consultant - (2) Senior
* **Accent levels:** Level 3
* **Government Business Requirements Category:** Human Resources, Business Consulting, and Change Management
* **Pricing Methods:** Equivalent Requirements - COMF Fair & Balanced Pricing

## Closing Information

* **Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, February 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Document/Presentation:** Available on the Buy and Sell section of the Government of Canada website.
* **Contact for Informations (Language of communication)**
	+ English: Alma Moyeda, 819-271-6488, alma.moyeda@sac-isc.gc.ca
	+ French: Alta Moyeda, 819-271-6488, alma.moyeda@sac-isc.gc.ca
	+ Fax: N/A
	+ Address: 10 Wellington St, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0H4, Canada
